sentences: Drennan is from a musical Irish family and was born in Luton, England: he and his family moved back to Ireland while he was at a young age.
He grew up in County Dublin and attended Kilmacud National School.
Drennan became a touring lead guitarist for the Corrs from late 1995 and onwards.
He was chosen as the touring second guitarist/bassist for Genesis on their 1998 Calling All Stations tour (replacing long-time live band member Daryl Stuermer).
In 2010 he was hired as a member of the revived Mike + the Mechanics.
Clannad : Past Present - Plays on In a lifetime with Mel Collins & Bono from U2
1992 : Andy Irvine & Davy Spillane : East Wind
1994 : Paul Harrington & Charlie McGettigan : Rock 'N' Roll Kids - Anthony plays electric guitar & bass
2002 : Will Young : From Now On - Plays on 2 songs
Gavin Friday : Catholic - Plays on 8 songs
Sharon Corr : The Same Sun - Plays classical guitar on 1 song
